content: Anuja Dharmaratne - Monash University View Scopus Profile Anuja Dharmaratne Assoc Professor Associate Professor, Department of Human Centred Computing https://orcid.org/0000-0002-5630-4818 EmailAnuja.Dharmaratnemonashedu Accepting PhD StudentsPhD projects-Event based feature detection and image classification-EEG and QEEG analysis for early detection of psychological disorders-Analysis of common learning behaviour patterns in programming classrooms 20032024 Research activity per year Personal profile BiographyAnuja Dharmaratne is an Associate Professor attached to the Department of Human Centred Computing (HCC) at Faculty of IT. She graduated from the University of Colombo, Sri Lanka in 1995 with a First Class Honours in Computer Science. She had her postgraduate education at Hiroshima University, Japan and obtained her M.Eng and Doctoral degrees from the Graduate School of Engineering in 2000 and 2004 respectively. Her main research interests are in Image Processing, Computer Vision, Game based education,  Learning Analytics, Digital Health and ICT for Society.
